# constraintsAffectingLayout(for:)

**Instance Method**

The constraints that impact the layout of the guide.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func constraintsAffectingLayout(for axis: NSLayoutConstraint.Axis) -> [NSLayoutConstraint]
```

## Debugging the layout guide

- **hasAmbiguousLayout**: A Boolean value indicating whether the constraints impacting the layout guide specify its location ambiguously.
